choices.A: flooded to all ports except the one from which it originated
choices.C: sent to the port identified for the known MAC address
choices.B: forwarded to the first available port

discussion.content: The answer is C, "a frame for a known destination MAC address"

Selected Answer: A
there is no port for the unknown mac address. it shall be flooded to all ports except the originated port.
This one was extremely obvious. I don't know how someone could get this question wrong, but whatever. gg good day Go Dodgers

Selected Answer: C
The answer is C
I can see what the setter did... try to trick our eyes think it is an unknown address LOL

comments.content:
question says "known" not "unknown" so answer is C
if was "unknown" would be A
erm, actually A would be wrong too because the switch would forward it to all ports in the same vlan exept the one it came from🤓☝️.

Selected Answer: A
"Let's quickly go over the main advantages of network automation:
...
Key data services can be delivered more quickly, network performance can be improved, and the rollout of new services and applications can be accelerated."

https://www.zenarmor.com/docs/network-basics/best-network-automation-tools

Also, all the other answers are wrong.

Selected Answer: A
The reason why a company would choose to use network automation in an enterprise is to provide data services faster (Option A). Network automation can optimize network performance and speed up the rollout of new services and applications. It also reduces time spent on repetitive tasks, eliminates human error, and increases efficiency. This allows IT teams to focus on strategic opportunities that drive business growth.
https://www.manageengine.com/network-configuration-manager/importance-of-network-automation.html
